programme.title: Apna Sapna Money Money
programme.desc: Directed by Sangeeth Sivan, this ensemble comedy follows a colorful cast including a cross-dressing conman, a gangster, and a fake priest all scheming to get rich quick. The film features Suniel Shetty, Ritesh Deshmukh, and Shreyas Talpade, and offers a mix of slapstick humor and mistaken identities.

programme.title: Commando 3
programme.desc: Commando 3 is an action-packed thriller that follows Karanveer Singh Dogra (played by Vidyut Jammwal), an elite Indian commando, who is sent on a mission to London to track down and eliminate a terrorist threat. As he uncovers a deadly plot aimed at dividing India on religious lines, he must use his combat skills and intelligence to protect his country. With high-octane stunts, intense chase sequences, and a patriotic theme, the film keeps audiences on edge. Directed by Aditya Datt, it’s the third installment in the Commando series.

programme.title: Apna Sapna Money Money

The film features Suniel Shetty, Ritesh Deshmukh, and Shreyas Talpade, and offers a mix of slapstick humor and mistaken identities.

programme.title: Commando 3
programme.desc: Commando 3 is an action-packed thriller that follows Karanveer Singh Dogra (played by Vidyut Jammwal), an elite Indian commando, who is sent on a mission to London to track down and eliminate a terrorist threat. As he uncovers a deadly plot aimed at dividing India on religious lines, he must use his combat skills and intelligence to protect his country. With high-octane stunts, intense chase sequences, and a patriotic theme, the film keeps audiences on edge. Directed by Aditya Datt, it’s the third installment in the Commando series.

programme.title: Shakti - The Power
programme.desc: Directed by Krishna Vamsi, this drama stars Karisma Kapoor as Nandini, who, after her husband's death, finds herself trapped in a violent and oppressive village. Determined to escape with her son, she battles societal norms and familial opposition.

programme.title: Apna Sapna Money Money
programme.desc: Directed by Sangeeth Sivan, this ensemble comedy follows a colorful cast including a cross-dressing conman, a gangster, and a fake priest all scheming to get rich quick. The film features Suniel Shetty, Ritesh Deshmukh, and Shreyas Talpade, and offers a mix of slapstick humor and mistaken identities.

programme.title: Coolie No. 1
programme.desc: In this classic David Dhawan comedy, Raju, a railway coolie, is roped into a scheme to pose as a millionaire to marry the daughter of a status-obsessed man. As lies pile up, Raju juggles his dual identity, resulting in a series of humorous situations.

programme.title: Awarapan
programme.desc: Directed by Mohit Suri, Awarapan stars Emraan Hashmi as a tormented hitman working for a crime lord. When he's assigned to monitor his boss's mistress, he begins to question his life choices, leading to a path of self-discovery and redemption. The film is an uncredited remake of the South Korean movie A Bittersweet Life.

programme.title: Suraj Pe Mangal Bhari
programme.desc: Suraj, an eligible bachelor, finds himself getting rejected by the families of many potential brides. Soon, he learns that a wedding detective named Madhu Mangal Rane is the reason.
